data.message: Also, My account was hacked a few years ago and possibly recently... A person from New Jersey kept trying to get into my account and my computer said they did once. I have changed my passed word many times since but still sometimes, get notices that someone is bothered by my account.

replies.message: Hey Michelle. If you think someone has logged into your account without your permission, we recommend that you secure it right away. Learn how: http://on.fb.me/22JAj7j. -Abby
